verses.verse: וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <WH5046> And it was told לְיוֹאָ֑ב <WH3097> Joab הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> Behold the king בֹּכֶ֛ה <WH1058> weepeth וַיִּתְאַבֵּ֖ל <WH56> and mourneth עַל־ <WH5921> for אַבְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <WH53> for Absalom

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> was turned הַתְּשֻׁעָ֜ה <WH8668> And the victory בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֛וּא <WH1931> he לְאֵ֖בֶל <WH60> was [turned] into mourning לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> unto all the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> for the people בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> say נֶעֱצַ֥ב <WH6087> was grieved הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> how the king עַל־ <WH5921> for בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> for his son

וַיִּתְגַּנֵּ֥ב <WH1589> them by stealth הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> And the people בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he לָב֣וֹא <WH935> gat הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> into the city כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יִתְגַּנֵּ֗ב <WH1589> steal away הָעָם֙ <WH5971> as people הַנִּכְלָמִ֔ים <WH3637> being ashamed בְּנוּסָ֖ם <WH5127> when they flee בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in battle

וְהַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> But the king לָאַ֣ט <WH3813> covered אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> his face וַיִּזְעַ֥ק <WH2199> cried הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king ק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> with a loud בְּנִי֙ <WH1121> O my son אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> Absalom אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH53> O Absalom בְּנִ֥י <WH1121> my son בְנִֽי׃ <WH1121> my son ס

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> And Joab אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> into the house וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> and said הֹבַ֨שְׁתָּ <WH3001> Thou hast shamed הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> this day אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the faces כָל־ <WH3605> of all עֲבָדֶ֗יךָ <WH5650> of all thy servants הַֽמְמַלְּטִ֤ים <WH4422> have saved אֶֽת־ <WH853> נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <WH5315> thy life הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> which this day וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> נֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the lives בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> of thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1323> and of thy daughters וְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the lives נָשֶׁ֔יךָ <WH802> of thy wives וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> and the lives פִּלַגְשֶֽׁיךָ׃ <WH6370> of thy concubines

לְאַֽהֲבָה֙ <WH157> In that thou lovest אֶת־ <WH853> שֹׂ֣נְאֶ֔יךָ <WH8130> thine enemies וְלִשְׂנֹ֖א <WH8130> and hatest אֶת־ <WH853> אֹהֲבֶ֑יךָ <WH157> thy friends כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for הִגַּ֣דְתָּ <WH5046> For thou hast declared הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> this day כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> are nothing לְךָ֙ שָׂרִ֣ים <WH8269> that thou regardest neither princes וַעֲבָדִ֔ים <WH5650> nor servants כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> I perceive הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> for this day כִּ֠י <WH3588> for [לֹא כ] (ל֣וּ <WH3863> if ק) אַבְשָׁל֥וֹם <WH53> Absalom חַי֙ <WH2416> had lived וְכֻלָּ֤נוּ <WH3605> and all הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> this day מֵתִ֔ים <WH4191> and all we had died כִּי־ <WH3588> for אָ֖ז <WH227> then יָשָׁ֥ר <WH3477> convenient בְּעֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> affliction

וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now ק֣וּם <WH6965> Now therefore arise צֵ֔א <WH3318> go forth וְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and speak עַל־ <WH5921> and לֵ֣ב <WH3820> comfortably עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> unto thy servants כִּי֩ <WH3588> if בַיהוָ֨ה <WH3068> by the LORD נִשְׁבַּ֜עְתִּי <WH7650> for I swear כִּי־ <WH3588> if אֵינְךָ֣ <WH369> not יוֹצֵ֗א <WH3318> if thou go not forth אִם־ <WH518> surely יָלִ֨ין <WH3885> there will not tarry אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> one אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> with thee this night וְרָעָ֧ה <WH7451> unto thee than all the evil לְךָ֣ זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָה֙ <WH7451> adversity אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> that בָּ֣אָה <WH935> that befell עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> upon מִנְּעֻרֶ֖יךָ <WH5271> thee from thy youth עַד־ <WH5704> until עָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> now ס

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> arose הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> and sat בַּשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> in the gate וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֞ם <WH5971> unto all the people הִגִּ֣ידוּ <WH5046> And they told לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> Behold the king יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> doth sit בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> in the gate וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And all the people לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> for Israel נָ֖ס <WH5127> had fled אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְאֹהָלָֽיו׃ <WH168> to his tent ס

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become כָל־ <WH3605> All הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And all the people נָד֔וֹן <WH1777> were at strife בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> The king הִצִּילָ֣נוּ ׀ <WH5337> saved מִכַּ֣ף <WH3709> us out of the hand אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ <WH341> of our enemies וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he מִלְּטָ֙נוּ֙ <WH4422> and he delivered מִכַּ֣ף <WH3709> us out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> now בָּרַ֥ח <WH1272> and now he is fled מִן־ <WH4480> out הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> for Absalom

וְאַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> And Absalom אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom מָשַׁ֣חְנוּ <WH4886> whom we anointed עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> over מֵ֖ת <WH4191> over us is dead בַּמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> in battle וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now לָמָ֥ה <WH4100> why אַתֶּ֛ם <WH859> are you מַחֲרִשִׁ֖ים <WH2790> Now therefore why speak לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> back אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king ס

וְהַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And king דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> David שָׁ֠לַח <WH7971> sent אֶל־ <WH413> to צָד֨וֹק <WH6659> to Zadok וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אֶבְיָתָ֥ר <WH54> and to Abiathar הַכֹּהֲנִים֮ <WH3548> the priests לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying דַּבְּר֞וּ <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> unto the elders יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תִֽהְיוּ֙ <WH1961> are you אַֽחֲרֹנִ֔ים <WH314> Why are ye the last לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> back אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> [even] to his house וּדְבַר֙ <WH1697> the word כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of all Israel בָּ֥א <WH935> is come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> house

אַחַ֣י <WH251> Ye [are] my brethren אַתֶּ֔ם <WH859> you עַצְמִ֥י <WH6106> ye [are] my bones וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <WH1320> and my flesh אַתֶּ֑ם <WH859> you וְלָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why תִהְי֛וּ <WH1961> should אַחֲרֹנִ֖ים <WH314> wherefore then are ye the last לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> to bring back אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> king

וְלַֽעֲמָשָׂא֙ <WH6021> ye to Amasa תֹּֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> And say הֲל֛וֹא <WH3808> not עַצְמִ֥י <WH6106> [Art] thou not of my bone וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <WH1320> body אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> so יַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> do לִּ֤י אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> angels וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> also יוֹסִ֔יף <WH3254> so to me and more אִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֠א <WH3808> not שַׂר־ <WH8269> also if thou be not captain צָבָ֞א <WH6635> of the host תִּהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> become לְפָנַ֛י <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> me הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> me continually תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> in the room יוֹאָֽב׃ <WH3097> of Joab

וַיַּ֛ט <WH5186> And he bowed אֶת־ <WH853> לְבַ֥ב <WH3824> the heart כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אִישׁ־ <WH376> of all the men יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> even as [the heart of] one וַֽיִּשְׁלְחוּ֙ <WH7971> so that they sent אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [this word] unto the king שׁ֥וּב <WH7725> Return אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> thou and all thy servants

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <WH7725> returned הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> So the king וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> far הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> to Jordan וִיהוּדָ֞ה <WH3063> And Judah בָּ֣א <WH935> came הַגִּלְגָּ֗לָה <WH1537> to Gilgal לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to go לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> to meet הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לְהַעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> over אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

וַיְמַהֵ֗ר <WH4116> hasted שִׁמְעִ֤י <WH8096> And Shimei בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרָא֙ <WH1617> of Gera בֶּן־ הַיְמִינִ֔י <WH1145> a Benjamite אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who מִבַּֽחוּרִ֑ים <WH980> which [was] of Bahurim וַיֵּ֙רֶד֙ <WH3381> and came down עִם־ <WH5973> with אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> with the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah לִקְרַ֖את <WH7125> to meet הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> David

וְאֶ֨לֶף <WH505> And [there were] a thousand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men עִמּוֹ֮ <WH5973> with מִבִּנְיָמִן֒ <WH1144> of Benjamin וְצִיבָ֗א <WH6717> with him and Ziba נַ֚עַר <WH5288> the servant בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> of Saul וַחֲמֵ֨שֶׁת <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> sons וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and his twenty עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> servants אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> and they וְצָלְח֥וּ <WH6743> with him and they went over הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <WH3383> Jordan לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וְעָבְרָ֣ה <WH5674> And there went over הָעֲבָרָ֗ה <WH5679> a ferry boat לַֽעֲבִיר֙ <WH5674> to carry over אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> household הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וְלַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> and to do הַטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> good [בְּעַיְנֹו כ] (בְּעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> affliction ק) וְשִׁמְעִ֣י <WH8096> And Shimei בֶן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרָ֗א <WH1617> of Gera נָפַל֙ <WH5307> fell down לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king בְּעָבְר֖וֹ <WH5674> as he was come over בַּיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And said אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אַל־ <WH408> nor יַחֲשָׁב־ <WH2803> impute לִ֣י אֲדֹנִי֮ <WH113> Let not my lord עָוֹן֒ <WH5771> iniquity וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <WH2142> unto me neither do thou remember אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what הֶעֱוָ֣ה <WH5753> did perversely עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> that which thy servant בַּיּ֕וֹם <WH3117> the day אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> when יָׅצָ֥ׅאׅ <WH3318> went out אֲדֹנִֽי־ <WH113> that my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מִירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem לָשׂ֥וּם <WH7760> should take הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king אֶל־ <WH413> to לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> it to his heart
